sn31.1:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery. …
sn31.1:1.3: “Mendicants, I will teach you about the gods of fairykind.
sn31.1:1.5: And what are the gods of fairykind?
sn31.1:1.6: There are gods who live in fragrant roots,
sn31.1:1.16: These are called the gods of fairykind.”
